page.title: 17"Incomers" to Harberton area
page.content: With the possible exception of some of the farming community, most inhabitants were born outside the area. Some older members of the community may have only moved across parish boundries, but many young families are from different parts of the country. As with many country area you are not considered "local" even when you have lived here for several years. The general attitude to "incomers" seems to be that they are welcome provided they are prepared to join in village life but not if they try to dominate it. Although the comment was also made that often it is the incomers who organise various events.
